# content

**Instance Property**

The contents of a cell.

## Declaration

```swift
var content: DocumentObservation.Container { get }
```

## Inspecting a cell

- **columnRange**: The range of column indices that the cell spans.
- **rowRange**: The range of row indices that the cell spans.

items.description: The range of column indices that the cell spans.
items.name: columnRange

items.description: The range of row indices that the cell spans.
items.name: rowRange
